Data Processing

Detailed Description

This module gathers together the key classes that support the manipulation and processing of data.

This include the implementation of shared data pools and of control blocks to encapsulate generic data processing algorithms. The design of these classes is primarily based upon the control block, data pool and connection design patterns (see the design pattern table).
